calendarInvite.title: BrAPI Virtual Hackathon - October 2023
calendarInvite.description:
Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This virtual event will run from October 23-27, 2023. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information. 

Event Details: https://brapi.org/events/hackathon

projects.title: BrAPI Sync
projects.description: brapi sync. Also, we may need to discuss some features in KSU Field Book

projects.team: Mark Watson, Any of the developers of the various brapir R packages (I'm not sure if any will be present or not).
projects.title: BrAPI-R
projects.description: I'm working on a set of modular R Shiny apps that use BrAPI via the brapir-v1 R package for interactive breeding data analyses (the goal is for these to be especially tinkerable, so breeders can modify them themselves for miscellaneous analyses that aren't covered in breedbase instances). I'm interested in integrating new BrAPI features (working with any brapir developers if they're present), along with improving performance and adding better documentation for GitHub.

projects.title: QBMS R Package
projects.description: QBMS R package enables your analysis pipeline to query and retrieve phenotypic and genotypic data from your breeding management system(s) like BMS, BreedBase, and GIGWA using BrAPI calls. During this hackathon, we plan to improve the efficiency of extracting genotypic data from the latest GIGWA server release (beta version 2.5.2) by implementing the BrAPI v2.1 “/search/allelematrix” endpoint support.

calendarInvite.title: BrAPI Hackathon - Greensville, SC, USA
calendarInvite.description:
Join the BrAPI community for a week of fun as we hack code together and discuss the future of BrAPI. This hackathon is will be in Greenville, South Carolina, USA on March 20-24, 2023. A big "thank you" to Trevor Rife and Clemson University for hosting this event. Everyone in the BrAPI community is welcome! Please register to receive meeting invitations and other important information. 

Event Details: https://brapi.org/events/hackathon-mar-2023
calendarInvite.location: CU-ICAR TD Gallery and Plaza, 5 Research Drive, Greenville, SC 29607, USA

projects.title: U of Manatoba BrAPI Implementation

projects.title: Enhance QBMS R Package
projects.description: QBMS R package is used to Query the Breeding Management System(s) like BMS, BreeBase, and GIGWA (using BrAPI calls) and retrieve phenotypic and genotypic data directly into any analyzing pipeline developed in R statistical environment. During the hackathon, we will implement several tactics like cache requests, async calls and paginations, preventing abuse (e.g., DDoS filtering) by setting a rate-limit, use BrAPI v2.1 '/search/allelematrix' endpoint, etc.
projects.needs: Interested collaborators from BMS, BreedBase, and GIGWA.
